goals.complete: Zojja and Mr. Sparkles joined Pol and I in an attempt to reclaim our translocator, but the Inquest was ready for us. That skunk Teyo used the translocator to scatter us all over the region. I was able to find Pol and Mr. Sparkles, but not Zojja. We can't just leave her in the Inquest's clutches, so we made tracking her down and rescuing her our top priority.
